meanings.sent2: Our family loves to spend time together.
meanings.sent3: Our cat thinks she owns the place!
meanings.sent4: The trees in our yard sway gently in the wind.
meanings.sent5: Our friendship is like a warm blanket on a cold day.

meanings.sent2: The painting in our living room is beautiful.
meanings.sent3: Our favorite song always makes us dance.
meanings.sent4: The memories of our childhood are precious.
meanings.sent5: Our bond is unbreakable, like a chain of love.

meanings.definition: Used to emphasize that something belongs to or is associated with us
meanings.sent2: Our friends are coming over for dinner.
meanings.sent3: Our laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: The stars in our sky shine brightly at night.
meanings.sent5: Our dreams are like seeds waiting to bloom.
